Diamond::
She smiled, rather pleased with herself thus far."Well, as I had 
said, I came all the way from Cybertron.  I was under the command of 
the High Predacon Council.  I was desined and created as an assassin. 
I killed many high Maximal officials. but the one that got me almost 
killed was the assassination of Quantis.  I killed him and then my 
leaders turned me into the maximal authorities.  I was to be tried 
and killed. But I escaped.  The last thing I remember was my ship 
getting sucked into a black hole. After that, I remember nothing 
untill I woke up in your arms."  she smiled at him, "Which I aim to 
thank you properly for later on."

Squizzy::
She tried her best to help all three of them to the lab.  She got the 
last three chambers ready. "OK all, just step in and in no time flat, 
you'll be as good as new."  she said in a cheerful voice.  She 
wondered how she went from protoform and DNA engineer to hospital 
staff.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
> 
> Keeping an eye on Diamond, DevilDuer turns around and walks off down
> a 
> different corridor. A silent command from him takes the base off of 
> lockdown, blast doors lifting throughout the corridors.
> 
> "So, what's your story?" he asks, walking down a hallway, heading 
for 
> the CR chambers.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing the Alliance base's doors open, Bloodystrike walks out of 
the 
> shuttle, carrying Reptilica over his shoulder.
> 
> "Hey, Rep needs a CR," he says to Squizzy, looking over the other
> two, 
> "And it looks like they might too.."
>
